title: Update profile successfully and see Toast notification
description: Verifies an authenticated user can update first name and see the success toast.

steps.description: Navigate to /login
Type "admin" into the first input field
Type "123456" into the second input field
Click the button with text "เข้าสู่ระบบ" or "Login"
Verify URL contains "/dashboard"
Navigate to /settings/profile
Change the First Name field to "Pongamon"
Click the button with text "บันทึกการเปลี่ยนแปลง"
Verify text "บันทึกข้อมูลสำเร็จ" is visible

title: Invalid email validation triggered
description: Verifies that entering an invalid email shows the correct Thai error message.

steps.description: Navigate to /login
Login as admin
Navigate to /settings/profile
Type "not-an-email" into the email field
Click "บันทึกการเปลี่ยนแปลง"
Verify text "รูปแบบอีเมลไม่ถูกต้อง" is visible

title: Required field validation triggered
description: Verifies that clearing a name field shows the correct Thai error message.

steps.description: Navigate to /login
Login as admin
Navigate to /settings/profile
Clear the First Name field
Click "บันทึกการเปลี่ยนแปลง"
Verify text "กรุณาระบุชื่อจริง" is visible

title: Driver Login Page Accessibility
description: Verifies that the driver login page renders correctly at /mobile/login.

steps.description: Navigate to /mobile/login
Verify the text "Driver Login" or logo is visible
Verify login form inputs are present
